name: Cruise Lines International Association Europe
goal: CLIA Europe represents the leading cruise companies operating in Europe. CLIA Europe is the European section of Cruise Lines International Association (CLIA), the world's largest cruise industry trade association with representation in North and South America, Europe, Asia and Australasia. CLIA represents the interests not only of cruise lines but also travel agents, port authorities and destinations.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Environment, Transport, Labour Affairs, Taxation, Ports & Destinations and Tourism & Consumer Affairs are the main subject areas.
